title: Double weight pocket, black, left - Tecline

photos.alt: Kieszeń balastowa podwójna z ruchomym d-ringiem, czarna, lewa - Tecline

description:
Product description

DOUBLE WEIGHT POCKET, LEFT

 

DESCRIPTION:

- Double weight pocket, left, with a buckle and movable d-ring

- To be fixed on a backplate with the included screws

- The pocket holds up to  4-5kg of weights (depending on the shape of weights)

- Delivered with an insert which helps to install the weights in place

 

NOTE!

THE POCKET IS DELIVERED WITH A SHORT SCREW:

Please use the included short screw to install the pocket to the backplate. If you need to install the pocket and, another piece of accessory (e.g. backplate softpad)

please use a long screw (T01103), to be purchased separately.
